page.description: The definition of a marker point.

discussion.p: The marker point draws the data points as a predefined shape. The shape of the marker can either be explicitly or dynamically chosen. By default, line and fill colors will be inherited from the data group color (see *[link:A5.chart Radial Layer Object]* "colors").

The "label" settings applicable to the marker are "location" and "offset.axis". Values of "label.location" can be "none", "callout", "outside", "inside", "above", "below", "before", "after", "adj-above", "adj-below", "adj-before" and "adj-after". The value of "inside" will place the label towards the center of the chart, and "outside" to the away from the center. Multiple alignments of the "above", "below", "before" and "after" values can be applied by combining values using spaces (for example "above after"). The "adj" prefix will make the given alignment occur after the rotation (if any) has been applied.

property.name: shape
property.description: The shape of the marker. Values can be "dot" (the default), "bar-v", "bar-h", "bar-bltr", "bar-tlbr", "diamond", "square", "square-round", "x", "cross", "tri-b", "tri-t", "tri-r" and "tri-l". A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the shape.

property.name: size
property.description: The size of the marker. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the size.

property.name: line
property.description: The marker line definition. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Line Object]*.

property.name: fill
property.description: The marker fill definition. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Fill Object]*.

property.name: label
property.description: The marker label. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Label Object]*.

property.name: attrs
property.description: The attributes to add to the marker element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the attributes.

property.name: tip
property.description: The mouseover tip to add to the marker element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the tip.
